characters: Driver of a white van, motorcyclist, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white van is moving slowly. On the left side, a black car is overtaking the van. On the right side, a motorcyclist appears and then falls down, causing a pedestrian to rush to help.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow speed due to the white van ahead. The vehicles speed remains consistent to avoid collision with the van and the motorcyclist on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: A black car, approximately 3 meters away, overtaking the van. 3) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 2 meters away, falls down suddenly. 4) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 1 meter away, rushing to help the motorcyclist.
